md:
giải nghĩa từ "gain" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Gain (verb) - Tăng, tăng thêm, thu được
	+ Meaning: To get or obtain something, especially as a result of effort or hard work.
	+ Example: "She gained a lot of experience from her internship."
	+ Related words: earn, obtain, acquire, achieve
	+ Antonyms: lose, decrease, reduce

* Gain (noun) - Lợi nhuận, lợi ích
	+ Meaning: An advantage or benefit that is obtained or achieved.
	+ Example: "The company made a significant gain in the stock market."
	+ Related words: profit, benefit, advantage, increase
	+ Antonyms: loss, disadvantage, decrease

* Gain (electronics) - Độ khuếch đại
	+ Meaning: The amount of amplification or increase in signal strength.
	+ Example: "The gain on the amplifier needs to be adjusted."
	+ Related words: amplification, boost, increase, enhancement
	+ Antonyms: attenuation, reduction, decrease

Note: The meanings and examples provided are just a few illustrations of the different ways the word "gain" can be used. The word can have other meanings and connotations depending on the context in which it is used.

  • Gain (verb) - Tăng, tăng thêm, thu được

    • Example: "The company made a significant gain in the stock market."
    • Related words: profit, benefit, advantage, increase

  • Gain (electronics) - Độ khuếch đại

    • Meaning: The amount of amplification or increase in signal strength.
    • Example: "The gain on the amplifier needs to be adjusted."
    • Related words: amplification, boost, increase, enhancement

Note: The meanings and examples provided are just a few illustrations of the different ways the word "gain" can be used. The word can have other meanings and connotations depending on the context in which it is used.
